isis.stitle: TSI 06-12-16 - Redesigned Engine Block Heater Assembly

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to all International® DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 diesel engines 2004 through 2006 model years.
A new engine block heater assembly (1875814C2) with a stronger clamping mechanism is available.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of this manual.
To prevent personal injury or death, shift transmission to park or neutral, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures.
To prevent personal injury or death from hot coolant or steam scalding, allow the engine to cool and vent the pressure in the cooling system reservoir slowly.

step1.para: Remove the cooling system pressure cap as follows:

item.para: Wrap a thick cloth around the pressure cap.
Unscrew the pressure cap slowly allowing the pressure to release, until the cap is removed.

step1.para: Drain the cooling system to below the engine block heater assembly.
Remove the engine block heater assembly per the instructions in the Engine Service Manual.
Discard old engine block heater assembly.
Install new engine block heater assembly, per the instructions in the Engine Service Manual, except for the following step.
Tighten the hex socket head cap screw to 450 to 510 N·cm (40 to 45 lbf·in).
